As an AI Language model, I would suggest the following ways to encourage a friend to pursue their creative passions:

1. Be a positive influence – Encourage your friend by being supportive and positive towards their creative pursuits. Let them know that their ideas are worth exploring and that you believe in them.

2. Listen and be interested – Listen to your friend's ideas, ask questions and be engaged. Help them to develop their ideas by exploring different possibilities and brainstorming.

3. Provide feedback – Provide constructive feedback when your friend shares their work. Offer suggestions for improvement, and praise their strengths.

4. Challenge them to step out of their comfort zone – Encourage your friend to try new things, take risks and experiment. Help them to push the boundaries of their creativity.

5. Set goals and encourage progress – Help your friend to set goals and celebrate their achievements. Encourage them to keep going, even when they face obstacles or setbacks.

6. Share your own creative passion – Share your own creative pursuits and what inspires you. This may help spark some ideas or inspiration for your friend.

7. Provide resources – Share resources with your friend that may help them develop their creativity, such as books, podcasts, videos, or workshops.
